title: NAPping PAnts (NAPPA): An open wearable solution for monitoring Infant's sleeping rhythms, respiration and posture
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Sofie de Sena, Matias Häggman, Jukka Ranta, Oleksii Roienko, Elina Ilén, Natalia Acosta, Jonna Salama, Turkka Kirjavainen, Nathan Stevenson, Manu Airaksinen, Sampsa Vanhatalo
